Article I of the Constitution gives Congress the responsibility to declare war, and I am unwilling to send any of our men and women in uniform into harm’s way on the orders of an impulsive and unstable President.
I am heading to the House floor now to vote in favor of a War Powers Resolution limiting President Trump’s ability to enter us into another uncertain endless war, this time with Iran.
